applications.title: Serverless Container-based APIs with Amazon ECS and Amazon API Gateway
applications.description: Sample API with containerized "Food Store" and "Pet Store" services, ReactJS client, deployable on AWS and LocalStack with ease, and testable on both local machines and CI using LocalStack.

applications.title: Shipment List Demo
applications.description: AWS in PROD and LocalStack on DEV environment.The shipment-list-demo is a Spring Boot app for performing CRUD operations on shipments that the user can view in the React interface.

applications.title: Step-up Authentication using Amazon Cognito
applications.description: Display Amazon API Gateway Lambda Authorizer with Amazon Cognito and DynamoDB, utilizing Lambda functions for Step-up workflow engine.

applications.title: Serverless microservices with Amazon API Gateway, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon SQS, and AWS Lambda
applications.description: Sample Serverless app deploys friend microservices using API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS on LocalStack for managing friend state asynchronously.

applications.title: Event-driven architecture with Amazon SNS FIFO, DynamoDB, Lambda, and S3
applications.description: The Event-driven architecture with Amazon SNS FIFO, DynamoDB, Lambda, and S3 sample demonstrates a recruiting agency application with a job listings website.
